creator: Mobile Games Entertainment Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Three Towers Solitaire is a solitaire game that is not solitary at all! In this game, you can battle it out with your friend in a multiplayer solitaire game.

Three Towers Solitaire and the rest of our solitaire games are free to download and play. In fact, all of our card games are free to download and play!

Your gaming skills will be put to the test as you play against the clock to win and brag amongst other players. Do you have what it takes? Let's find out!

♠️️ Free to play - Enjoy Three Towers Solitaire on your mobile phone for free.
♠️️ Classic design - No unnecessary features, focus on this classic card game in a completely new way
♠️️ Classic Three Towers gameplay (also known as Tri Towers, Triple Peaks, TriPeaks) - If you love a good card game like Pyramid Solitaire or Spider Solitaire, give this game a try!
♠️️ Endless fun - Collect bonuses on clearing towers and multiple card moves in a row.
♠️️ Train your brain - Have fun and exercise your mental skills with Three Towers Solitaire. Can you clear all the cards and solve the solitaire puzzle?

Playing Zen Tripeaks Solitaire is easy and fun. Tap a card to move it off the table. If there is no move available, tap to get a new card. Clear all the cards from the table!


Three Magic Towers Solitaire is also known as Three Towers Solitaire or TriPeaks Solitaire. The goal of this online solitaire game is to clear the three towers of cards to win a level, similar to our regular Tripeaks solitaire. Each time you complete a layout, you will move on to the next round of the game and begin again. To obtain a higher score try to complete as many rounds as possible in a row. The game ends if a round cannot be cleared.

Cards can be removed from the layout if they are one higher or lower than visible deck card shown at the bottom. If the visible card is an Ace, either a King or Two can be played. If you cannot play, click the next card to show the next card.

Solitaire: Three Magic Towers game is one of those delightful and amazing three towers solitaire free games that you can play with your friends and family.

Towers tripeaks solitaire is a game that is not solitary at all! In this solitaire TriPeaks game, you can battle it out with your friend in a multiplayer card game. If you love playing cards and looking for fun, challenging or easy solitaire card games free, then this tri solitaire is here for you. Your card gaming skills will be put to the test as you play against the clock to win and brag amongst other players. Do you have what it takes? Play our tower solitaire and find out.

So, whether you are looking for Three Towers card games to play alone or TriPeaks solitaire card games free to play with others, installing this tower solitaire will be worth the effort.

Solitaire: Three Magic Towers Card Game Offers:
** Versus Mode:
This pyramid solitaire free game contains a special mode called versus. This mode is mainly PVP option in which you play against other players all over the world in real time and you can follow the results of you and your opponent during the whole gameplay. Tripeaks solitaire free game will choose the right opponent for you in your “skill range”, so it’s always challenging enough. You can join an ongoing solitaire table or create your own.

** Tournaments:
You can play against other players and prove your skill, earning awesome rewards. So, if you are interested in playing tripeaks solitaire card games free where exciting tournaments are held, try this solitaire pyramid undoubtedly.

Download towers tripeaks solitaire game on your device, join a game or create your own game to invite others.

KEY FEATURES:



Classic Design:


Classic Three Towers gameplay (also known as Three Towers, Triple Peaks, TriPeaks) will keep you going for hours. If you love good old classic card games like tri solitaire or spider solitaire, give this tower solitaire game a try! Dive deep into the tripeaks solitaire adventure, play with skilled card players around the world, test your skill and enjoy limitlessly.

Fun for Everyone:


Whether you are looking for tri towers card games to play with your family in a game night or three towers solitaire free to play with friends, three towers solitaire card game is your right choice. We have designed this fantastic pyramid solitaire free game for everyone to enjoy their fullest. Collect bonuses on clearing towers and multiple cards moves in a row and win the game by competing with other skilled players worldwide.

Train your Brain for Free:


Have fun and exercise your mental skills with tri towers solitaire free, an amazing, still free and fun classic card game. Playing cards can make your brain to be smarter and quicker as you must observe and think carefully before making a move. With our Three Towers solitaire free game, you can easily exercise your brain the most amazing way. You don’t have to spend a single penny to install and play this classic pyramid solitaire anywhere in the world.

So, if you are looking for fun card games like TriPeaks solitaire free or magic solitaire card games free, install this solitaire TriPeaks right now. If there is no move available, tap to get a new card. Clear all the cards from the table!
